text: The Caledonian Railway Class 66 4-4-0 was a class of 28 British 4-4-0 type steam locomotives built for the Caledonian Railway in 1884-1891 they operated on the Caledonian Railway until 1923 when the LMS Railway took over . They were all scrapped by the 1930â€™s .
title: Caledonian Railway Class 66 4-4-0
